description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉官员，字伯松，原字仲慎。原为诸葛瑾的次子，后被诸葛亮收为养子。
description.en: An official of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period. His courtesy name was Bosong, originally Zhongshen. He was originally the second son of Zhuge Jin and was later adopted by Zhuge Liang.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期东吴官员，诸葛亮之兄，诸葛乔的生父。
description.en: An official of Eastern Wu during the Three Kingdoms period, the elder brother of Zhuge Liang, and the biological father of Zhuge Qiao.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期东吴将领、权臣，诸葛瑾长子，诸葛乔之兄。
description.en: A general and regent of Eastern Wu during the Three Kingdoms period, the eldest son of Zhuge Jin, and the elder brother of Zhuge Qiao.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛瑾的三子，诸葛乔的弟弟。
description.en: The third son of Zhuge Jin and the younger brother of Zhuge Qiao.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉丞相，诸葛瑾之弟，诸葛乔的养父。
description.en: Chancellor of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period, the younger brother of Zhuge Jin, and the adoptive father of Zhuge Qiao.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期东吴的建立者，吴大帝。
description.en: The founder of the state of Eastern Wu during the Three Kingdoms period, Emperor Da of Wu.

description.zh-cn: 中国三国时期的政权之一。
description.en: One of the states during the Three Kingdoms period of China.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉将领。
description.en: A general of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉官员，诸葛亮的亲生儿子。
description.en: An official of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period and the biological son of Zhuge Liang.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉官员，诸葛乔之子。后因诸葛恪一脉被诛杀，回归其亲生祖父诸葛瑾一脉以延续其后嗣。
description.en: An official of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period and the son of Zhuge Qiao. He later returned to the lineage of his biological grandfather Zhuge Jin to continue the family line after Zhuge Ke's branch was executed.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代县名，隶属于琅邪郡，今山东省临沂市沂南县。
description.en: An ancient county in China, under the jurisdiction of Langya Commandery, located in modern-day Yinan County, Linyi, Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛乔是诸葛瑾的次子（亲生）。
description.en: Zhuge Qiao was the second biological son of Zhuge Jin.

description.zh-cn: 由于诸葛亮早期无子，他请求诸葛瑾将诸葛乔过继给他作为养子。
description.en: As Zhuge Liang had no son in his early years, he requested Zhuge Jin to let him adopt Zhuge Qiao.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛乔是诸葛恪的弟弟。
description.en: Zhuge Qiao was the younger brother of Zhuge Ke.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛乔是诸葛融的哥哥。
description.en: Zhuge Qiao was the elder brother of Zhuge Rong.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛瑾是诸葛亮的哥哥。
description.en: Zhuge Jin was the elder brother of Zhuge Liang.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛瑾在同意将儿子诸葛乔过继给诸葛亮前，先禀告了东吴君主孙权。
description.en: Before agreeing to let his son Zhuge Qiao be adopted by Zhuge Liang, Zhuge Jin reported the matter to his lord, Sun Quan of Eastern Wu.

position.en: Fuma Duwei (Commander of the Imperial Son-in-law's Cavalry)

description.zh-cn: 诸葛乔来到蜀汉后，被任命为驸马都尉。
description.en: After arriving in Shu Han, Zhuge Qiao was appointed as Fuma Duwei.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛乔与霍弋一同在汉中参赞军务。
description.en: Zhuge Qiao participated in military affairs in Hanzhong together with Huo Yi.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛攀是诸葛乔的儿子。
description.en: Zhuge Pan was the son of Zhuge Qiao.

description.zh-cn: 在诸葛恪一脉被诛杀后，身为诸葛乔之子的诸葛攀回归其亲生祖父诸葛瑾一脉，以延续后嗣。
description.en: After Zhuge Ke's branch of the family was executed, Zhuge Pan, son of Zhuge Qiao, returned to the lineage of his biological grandfather Zhuge Jin to continue the family line.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛瞻是诸葛亮的亲生儿子。
description.en: Zhuge Zhan was the biological son of Zhuge Liang.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛乔的籍贯是琅邪郡阳都县。
description.en: Zhuge Qiao's ancestral home was Yangdu County, Langya Commandery.
